channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ZOOKEEPER-1221] Provide accessors for Request.{hdr|txn}
item.description:
I'm working on a larger patch that makes the Request class immutable. To see, where the hdr and txn fields are modified, it helped to introduce accessor methods. The JVM should happily inline the method calls so no performance overhead should be expected.

There's a minor, unrelated change included: ToBeAppliedRequestProcessor had a reference to the toBeApplied list of the Leader. So it was hard to find all places, where this list was actually modified. The patch gives instead the leader instance to the toBeAppliedRequestProcessor and the processor then accesses leader.toBeApplied.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12498746/ZOOKEEPER-1221.patch
against trunk revision 1180217.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-ZOOKEEPER-Build/616//console

-----------------------------------------------------------
This is an automatically generated e-mail. To reply, visit:
https://reviews.apache.org/r/2359/
-----------------------------------------------------------

Review request for zookeeper.

Summary
-------

I'm working on a larger patch that makes the Request class immutable. To see, where the hdr and txn fields are modified, it helped to introduce accessor methods. The JVM should happily inline the method calls so no performance overhead should be expected.

There's a minor, unrelated change included: ToBeAppliedRequestProcessor had a reference to the toBeApplied list of the Leader. So it was hard to find all places, where this list was actually modified. The patch gives instead the leader instance to the toBeAppliedRequestProcessor and the processor then accesses leader.toBeApplied.

This addresses bug ZOOKEEPER-1221.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ZOOKEEPER-1221

Diffs

Diff: https://reviews.apache.org/r/2359/diff

Testing
-------

Thanks,

Thomas
Nice cleanup. lgtm however the patch is no longer applying, can you update it?
